snippet.title: A Corgi's Cozy Hike - Nostalgia Mode Trailer
snippet.description:
EmBARK on a therapeutic adventure as a Corgi exploring a peaceful island getaway. Hike, climb, and soar to uncover treasures and cozy spots. No need to rush. Relax and savor the bite-sized open world while 10% of your purchase is donated to animal shelters. This trailer footage is filtered with the Nostalgia Mode pixelized filter that is togglable in the settings. 

Checkout the Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/scalisco/a-corgis-cozy-hike

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2321250/A_Corgis_Cozy_Hike

Check out our Corgi merch and learn about us: https://www.scalisco.com
Follow on Twitter:
https://www.twitter.com/rescuepetsgame
Follow on Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/rescuepetsgame
Follow on TikTok:
https://www.tiktok.com/@rescuepetsgame

We are a two person team who wanted to make a non-violent adventure without fail-states for people to play around in like a giant dog park! A Corgi's Cozy Hike is inspired by cozy games like A Short Hike/Lil Gator Game, 3D platformers like Mario: Bowser's Fury/Banjo-Kazooie, and of course, Zelda: Breath of the Wild.

As with our previous games, we will donate a portion of your purchases to animal shelters to help real dogs. Our first shelter will be Dog Gone Seattle, a shelter we have a long history with. They do amazing work rescuing dogs from all over the US and helping them get adopted.
